rooms.description: Open concept living room adjacent to the central courtyard for natural light and ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
Dining area connected with the living room, designed with sufficient space for joint family meals.
Guest bedroom located near the central courtyard to ensure a serene environment and easy access.
Private gym fitted with modern equipment for fitness routines, ensuring privacy and adequate ventilation through adjacent windows.
Kitchen area designed ergonomically to support joint family cooking, placed in a corner as per Vastu principles for energy flow.
Primary bathroom adjacent to the kitchen and living areas for efficient plumbing layout, with proper ventilation.
Utility room for storage and housekeeping tasks, ensuring ease of access from the kitchen.

openings.description: Main entrance designed to welcome positive energy as per Vastu guidelines.
Window opening for cross ventilation between the courtyard and adjacent rooms.
Larger window for natural light and air circulation in the private gym area.
